effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

spells.description:
Equip: You are one of the devout. Increases the effectiveness of Sacred Flame's Ward by 100%.

Sacred Flame's Ward:
While in Khaz Algar, dealing damage has a high chance of burning the enemy with righteous fire dealing 55,491 Radiant damage. In addition, you take 5% less damage.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,244 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 623 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 17,225 Agility for 15 sec.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to siphon 196,124 Health from yourself and cast it into the void for 3 seconds. 

Upon its return, deal 424,979 damage to a random enemy within 30 yards.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your autoattacks do an additional 3,235 Shadow damage.
